pullRequest.title: Issue #8169: Making regex to validate missed space in comments in non files
pullRequest.bodyText: Issue #8169: Making regex to validate missed space in comments in non main files

nodes.bodyText: space is required in comments -> space is required after comment start
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -38,4 +38,19 @@
       <property name="message"
                value="Two or more test cases are required for unit testing in Xpath "/>
     </module>
+    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
+        <property name="format" value="<!--[^ ]"/>
+        <property name="fileExtensions" value="xml, properties"/>
+        <property name="message" value="space is required in comments"/>

nodes.bodyText: space is required in comments -> space is required before comment end
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -38,4 +38,19 @@
       <property name="message"
                value="Two or more test cases are required for unit testing in Xpath "/>
     </module>
+    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
+        <property name="format" value="<!--[^ ]"/>
+        <property name="fileExtensions" value="xml, properties"/>
+        <property name="message" value="space is required in comments"/>
+    </module>
+    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
+        <property name="format" value="[^ ]-->"/>
+        <property name="fileExtensions" value="xml, properties"/>
+        <property name="message" value="space is required in comments"/>

@@ -38,4 +38,19 @@
       <property name="message"
                value="Two or more test cases are required for unit testing in Xpath "/>
     </module>
+    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
+        <property name="format" value="<!--[^ ]"/>
+        <property name="fileExtensions" value="xml, properties"/>
+        <property name="message" value="space is required in comments"/>
+    </module>
+    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
+        <property name="format" value="[^ ]-->"/>
+        <property name="fileExtensions" value="xml, properties"/>
+        <property name="message" value="space is required in comments"/>
+    </module>
+    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
+        <property name="format" value=" #[^ !]"/>
+        <property name="fileExtensions" value="sh, yml"/>
+        <property name="message" value="space is required in comments"/>

beforeCommit.message: Issue #8169: Making regex to validate missed space in comments in non main files

afterCommit.message: Issue #8169: Making regex to validate missed space in comments in non main files

nodes.bodyText: #[^ !]" regex value has space before it. Is it necessary?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -38,4 +38,19 @@
       <property name="message"
                value="Two or more test cases are required for unit testing in Xpath "/>
     </module>
+    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
+        <property name="format" value="<!--[^ ]"/>
+        <property name="fileExtensions" value="xml, properties"/>
+        <property name="message" value="space is required after comment start"/>
+    </module>
+    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
+        <property name="format" value="[^ ]-->"/>
+        <property name="fileExtensions" value="xml, properties"/>
+        <property name="message" value="space is required before comment end"/>
+    </module>
+    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
+        <property name="format" value=" #[^ !]"/>

nodes.bodyText: I think yaml should be added, just in case
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -38,4 +38,19 @@
       <property name="message"
                value="Two or more test cases are required for unit testing in Xpath "/>
     </module>
+    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
+        <property name="format" value="<!--[^ ]"/>
+        <property name="fileExtensions" value="xml, properties"/>
+        <property name="message" value="space is required after comment start"/>
+    </module>
+    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
+        <property name="format" value="[^ ]-->"/>
+        <property name="fileExtensions" value="xml, properties"/>
+        <property name="message" value="space is required before comment end"/>
+    </module>
+    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
+        <property name="format" value=" #[^ !]"/>
+        <property name="fileExtensions" value="sh, yml"/>
